DOC.brief_title: The Acute Effects Interesterification Commercially Used Fats Postprandial Lipaemia Satiety
DOC.detailed_description: Aim : The current study aim investigate acute effect commercially relevant interesterified 'hardstock ' versus correspond un-interesterified blend postprandial lipaemia , glycaemia , insulinaemia gut hormone response . Due previously observe difference gut hormone follow interesterified palm oil un-interesterified palm oil group , also explore acute effect fat satiety rate gastric empty . Hypothesis : Interesterification palm kernel palm stearin fat blend , produce fat high proportion palmitic acid middle position TAG ( fatty acid composition ) , alter postprandial lipid glucose metabolism . It also hypothesise difference rate absorption test fat influence gut hormone response feeling satiety . Subjects : Participants include 10 healthy male volunteer . In order determine 'typical ' response test fat , subject must affect metabolic syndrome way ( obesity , dyslipidemia , insulin resistance hypertension ) , must non-smokers ( since smoking influence postprandial lipaemia ) , age age 18 45 year ( since age metabolic change may take place may affect way body digest metabolises lipid ) . Male volunteer select elicit higher postprandial lipaemic response give fat load therefore sensitive dietary manipulation . Power calculation : A sample size 10 80 % power detect difference mean 112.74 unit area curve plasma TAG significance level ( alpha ) 0.05 ( two-tailed ) . Expected value : The study provide novel information acute effect commercially relevant spread postprandial lipaemia satiety . It also explore possible mechanism predict reduced lipaemia follow interesterified fat measurement gastric emptying .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age : 1845 2 . Male 3 . Healthy ( free diagnose disease list exclusion criterion ) 4 . Able understand information sheet willing comply study protocol 5 . Able give inform consent Exclusion criterion : 1 . Medical history myocardial infarction , angina , thrombosis , stroke , cancer , liver bowel disease diabetes 2 . Body mass index < 20 kg/m2 > 35 kg/m2 3 . Plasma cholesterol ≥7.5 mmol/L 4 . Plasma triacylglycerol > 3 mmol/L 5 . Plasma glucose > 7 mmol/L 6 . Blood pressure ≥160/100 mmHg 7 . Current use antihypertensive lipid lower medication 8 . Alcohol intake exceed moderate intake ( > 28 unit per week ) 9 . Current cigarette smoker 10 . ≥ 20 % 10year risk cardiovascular disease calculate use risk calculator 11 . Ingestion paracetamol precede 24 hr study day
